<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Surprise Strike](/Feats.aspx?ID=2101) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 199 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Weapon Improviser](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=82)

**Prerequisites**
[Weapon Improviser Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2099)

</column>

---

Whenever you make a Strike with an improvised weapon against a creature that hasn't seen you make a Strike using an improvised weapon or that is otherwise ignorant of your skill with improvised weapons, the creature is [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) against you for that Strike.
name: Surprise Strike
